mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1875) for an order placed for the Radnor Church of Christ by George D. McClellan for 200 two color window cards for a performance by Ira North at the Radnor Church of Christ on September 12-16. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
